name: THE iDOLM@STER: Shiny Festa Melodic Disc
summary: An entry in the popular idol management series from Bandai Namco. Melodic Disc is a port of the unlocalized PSP game with rhythm gameplay altered for touch and graphical enhancements for iOS devices.

alternative_names.name: THE iDOLM@STER SHINY FESTA Groovy Tune
